# Eve Roadmap

This roadmap lists the major work items we intend to work on over the next 2-3 months. This roadmap is subject to change, as we may reprioritize this list as needed.

## Content

### Design Docs

- [ ] Architecture
- [ ] Distribution
- [ ] Errors and Integrity
- [ ] Evaluation
- [ ] Interaction
- [ ] Memory
- [ ] Protocol
- [ ] Rationale
- [ ] Semantics
- [ ] Time

### Guides

- [ ] By Example
- [ ] For Programmers
- [ ] For Scientists
- [ ] For SQL
- [ ] Quickstart
- [ ] Relational Algevra
- [ ] Set Theory
- [ ] Solving Problems
- [ ] Style Guide
- [ ] What Eve Isn't

### Handbook
- [ ] Aggregates

- [ ] Names

- [ ] Standard Library
  - [ ] Math
  - [ ] String
    
### Demo Media

- [ ] Demo Website
